hero.title: Christian Lukito Pangestu
hero.roles: Web Developer, Mobile Developer, UI/UX Designer
about.title: About
about.lead1: I build web and mobile applications with a focus on functionality and user experience. I also enjoy working on UI/UX design and learning more about cybersecurity.
about.heading: Web & Mobile Developer
about.lead2: I have experience in web and mobile application development using various modern technologies. Currently, I am deepening my expertise in UI/UX design to create intuitive and engaging user interfaces. In addition, I am also interested in cybersecurity to ensure the applications I develop are secure and reliable.
profile.age.label: Age
about.body1: As a dedicated web and mobile developer, I specialize in creating dynamic, responsive applications that meet modern business needs. My expertise spans various programming languages and frameworks, allowing me to deliver robust solutions tailored to client specifications.
about.body2: Whether it's building an intuitive user interface or developing secure back-end services, I approach every project with a focus on quality and performance. My passion for technology is matched by my commitment to continuous learning, ensuring I stay at the forefront of industry trends.
about.body3: I'm always excited to take on new challenges, whether working independently or collaborating with a team. If you’re looking for a developer who can bring your ideas to life with creativity and precision, I’m here to help.

resume.summary.name: Christian Lukito
resume.summary.blurb: Project Manager and Backend Developer with experience in mobile and web systems. I build robust solutions, ensure smooth integrations, and drive projects from concept to delivery.
resume.education.title: Education

resume.education.items.desc: Coursework and projects in software engineering, machine learning, and data analysis.
Strong foundation in natural sciences and analytical thinking.

resume.experience.title: Professional Experience

resume.experience.items.role: Project Manager & Backend Developer Intern · Cashier Application Development
bullets: Led development of a cashier application that streamlines restaurant operations.
Prepared PRD, API docs, database schema, and application flow.
Designed the UI/UX to ensure an intuitive interface for staff and customers.
Built the Laravel backend for the customer-facing web app.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop an internal digital logbook system.
Built and optimized web-based features to improve documentation workflows.
Worked on both front-end and back-end tasks, including database integration and API development.
Contributed to ensuring compliance and data accuracy across enterprise-scale operations.

portfolio.items.title: POS
portfolio.items.description: Integrated restaurant POS that lets customers order and pay from their phones. Includes apps for cashier, kitchen, and waiters.

portfolio.items.title: Bingung di Bandung?
